summary: This mod simply adds KettleWitch's telescopes to be purchased from the Khajiit caravans that travel Skryim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds KettleWitch's telescopes to be purchased from the Khajiit caravans that travel Skryim. This integration of the telescopes into Skyrim's economy made sense to me, as it seems logical that the Khajiit caravans would bring strange and exotic merchandise from their travels.

The leather telescope may be bought at level 1, the iron telescopes at level 5, and the Dwemeri telescopes at level 12.

This mod should be safe to install at any time in a playthrough, but I recommend making a bashed patch if you have another mod that edits merchant's leveled lists.


Required mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30473/?]Telescope[/url] by KettleWitch

Recommended Mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30816/?]Guess the Distance - Perceptive Scouting[/url] by Ecceau
author: Zer0The0Her0
